subject: Unlock [Company Name]’s Potential with Strategic Consulting
body:
Hi [Recipient's Name],
I was impressed by [Company Name]’s vision! Our consulting expertise can help you:
✅ Develop a winning business strategy
✅ Optimize operations for efficiency
✅ Drive growth through data-driven insights
Could we schedule a 15-minute discovery call to explore tailored solutions for [Company Name]? Let me know what works for you!
Best regards,
[Your Name]

subject: Elevate [Company Name]’s Performance with Expert Guidance
body:
Hello [Recipient's Name],
I noticed [Company Name]’s impressive work! Our consulting services can support you with:
✅ Process optimization to boost productivity
✅ Financial planning for sustainable growth
✅ Leadership coaching to empower your team
Would you be open to a quick 10-minute chat to discuss your goals? Let me know a convenient time!
Warm regards,
[Your Name]

body:
